General.Name: Millennial Potash Corp.
General.Description: Millennial Potash Corp. engages in the exploration and evaluation of mineral properties in the United States. It holds an option to acquire a 90% interest in the Mohave gold project that consists of 160 claims and mill site claims covering an area of approximately 1,295 hectares located in Mohave County, Arizona. The company was formerly known as Black Mountain Gold USA Corp. and changed its name to Millennial Potash Corp. in January 2023. Millennial Potash Corp. was incorporated in 2015 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
